## genPassPhraseNormal

This function adds one to its input.

### Parameters

- `length` &#x20;
- `words` &#x20;
- `separator` (optional, default `defaultSeparator`)
- `input` **[number][5]** any number

Returns **[number][5]** that number, plus one.

## genPassPhraseCrypto

This function adds one to its input.

### Parameters

- `length` &#x20;
- `words` &#x20;
- `separator` (optional, default `defaultSeparator`)
- `input` **[number][5]** any number

Returns **[number][5]** that number, plus one.
